DescriptionData.Title: Pride Socks - Rainbow Striped Athletic Tube Socks - 19" Under the Knee
DescriptionData.Description:
Fun colorful rainbow tube socks are made of super soft Ring Spun cotton making these socks much softer than regular cotton socks. Great for costume or athletic wear. The rainbow stripes are red, orange, yellow, green, blue and purple and are at the top of the white tube sock.
Sized for kids and adults. Available in 19", 22", 25" and 35".
75% Ring Spun Cotton, 14% Nylon, 7% Acrylic, 4% Spandex. Made in the USA.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: The white tube socks have colorful rainbow stripes of red, orange, yellow, green, blue and purple at the top
75% Ring Spun Cotton, 14% Nylon, 7% Acrylic, 4% Spandex Made in the USA
